# Nationwide Bicycle and Pedestrian Statistics

## FARS
- [FTP Site](https://www.nhtsa.gov/file-downloads?p=nhtsa/downloads/FARS/)
- [Fatal Injury and Reporting System Tool (FIRST)](https://cdan.dot.gov/query)
- [2022 Analytical User Manual](https://crashstats.nhtsa.dot.gov/Api/Public/ViewPublication/813254)

## NHTSA
- [2020 Downloads](https://nhts.ornl.gov/od/downloads)
- [Other Years Downloads](https://nhts.ornl.gov/downloads)

## ACS/Decennial Census
- [ACS 1-Year Data, 2005-2020](https://www.census.gov/data/developers/data-sets/acs-1year.2020.html)
- [Means of Transportation to Work](https://censusreporter.org/tables/B08301/)
- [ACS data via API](https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/acs/data/data-via-api.html)
